chapters.title: Chapter 30: A Wager
chapters.info: Lord Edorion Selorna, p. 497 (352)—Plump, pink-cheeked Tairen Lord who played cards with Mat. He always reacted to his cards in the same way, as if he had been dealt all low single cards, but he won just as often as anyone else (except Mat). He rode out to meet Rand near Cairhien.
